description: The Committee for Education says it will play a "key role" in Guernsey's recovery from Covid-19.
title: Calls for Guernsey's further education reform to be 'accelerated'
title_page: Calls for Guernsey's further education reform to be 'accelerated' - BBC News
maintext: Mr Fallaize said: "For far too long there has been under-investment at the College of Further Education in particular, but we are now on the brink of a period of substantial investment in higher education and we should prioritise and accelerate it as the first major project of the Revive & Thrive Strategy.
